dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is defined as the use of telecommunication technologies for the exchange of medical information across distances Applications include patient management as well as research and education Teledermatology is a steadily growing category of telemedicine This article presents general aspects of telemedicine such as modes of data transmission and practical applications with a special emphasis on their significance for teledermatology
Teledermatology: how to start a new teaching and diagnostic era in medicine.
